thread.title: Panthers' Josh Norman Named NFC Defensive Player Of The Month
thread.title_full: Panthers' Josh Norman Named NFC Defensive Player Of The Month

title: Panthers' Josh Norman Named NFC Defensive Player Of The Month
text:
Panthers' Josh Norman Named NFC Defensive Player Of The Month Tools 
Story Created: Oct 1, 2015 at 2:50 PM EDT Story Updated: Oct 1, 2015 at 2:50 PM EDT 
CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- Carolina Panthers' cornerback Josh Norman was named NFC Defensive Player of the Month. 
Norman's interception in the closing minutes of the last week's game against the New Orleans Saints helped seal the win for the Panthers. 
Norman also held Houston Texans receiver DeAndre Hopkins to only 53 yards in Week 2.
